mapper.insert: insert into PRKPLCE_CELL_MNG( PRKPLCE_CODE, PRKPLCE_FLR_CODE, CELL_MAPNG_ID, CELL_TYPE, STYLE_CLS, SALE_CAR_INNB, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, SHAPE, TRANSFORM ) values( #{prkplceCode}, #{prkplceFlrCode}, #{cellMapngId}, #{cellType}, #{styleCls}, #{saleCarInnb}, #{x}, #{y}, #{width}, #{height}, #{shape}, #{transform} )
mapper.update: update PRKPLCE_CELL_MNG set CELL_TYPE = #{cellType}, STYLE_CLS = #{styleCls}, SALE_CAR_INNB = #{saleCarInnb}, X = #{x}, Y = #{y}, WIDTH = #{width}, HEIGHT = #{height}, SHAPE = #{shape}, TRANSFORM = #{transform} where PRKPLCE_CODE = #{prkplceCode} AND PRKPLCE_FLR_CODE = #{prkplceFlrCode} AND CELL_MAPNG_ID = #{cellMapngId}
mapper.select:
select CELL_TYPE, CELL_NM, SHAPE, STYLE, STYLE_CLS as class, FILL, STROKE, STROKE_WIDTH, STROKE_DASHARRAY, STROKE_LINECAP, FILL_OPACITY, STROKE_OPACITY, CX, CY, RX, RY, R, X, Y, X1, Y1, X2, Y2, D, DX, DY, POINTS, TRANSFORM, WIDTH, HEIGHT from SVG_OBJECT_INFO where 1=1
AND CELL_TYPE = #{cellType}
